fulltext:
LE HUYNH NGOC THUY
kate.le0248@gmail.com
CONTACT
6/6F, Street 12, Binh An
Ward, District 2
(+84)-126-745-8802
INTRODUCTION
I'm passionate about building a better world through software development. Interested in new technology, trying to
improve myself everyday as technologies are improving. In my opinion, my greatest abilities are my thirst for
knowledge and my persistence. I believe in people's potential. I think that a team can accomplish almost everything
with open-mindedness and a can-do attitude.
QUALIFICATIONS
Certifications:
- Diploma Degree in Software Engineering (FPT Aptech) 
- Bachelor of Information Technology Degree (RMIT University) 
Important Skills:
- Best technical skills: Javascript (AngularJS, jQuery, NodeJS), Java, Spring-boot, Golang, Docker, MySQL, Linux, LAMP
- Best soft skills: Absorb new things, Teamwork, Self-discipline, Organize
Other technical skills:
- Agile, Test Driven Development, Domain Driven Development
- HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap
- Jenkins (CI, CD), AWS, Heroku
- Typescript, Python, Django, C, C++, Sails
WORK EXPERIENCE
MyStar-Japan (in Tokyo, Japan)
Jan 2014 — Jul 2014
Web Developer (Mobile - Intern)
At MyStar-Japan, I work as a full-stack developer
- Technologies: AngularJS, jQuery Mobile and PHP (Chamilo framework - a framework that built especially for online
courses)
Website: http://www.mystar-japan.biz/
Beachhead marketing
Jul 2014 — May 2015
Fullstack Developer
At Beachhead Marketing, I work as a full-stack developer
- Technologies: Marketo, Salesforce, NodeJS, Valilla JS, jQuery, D3.js
Apiumtech
May 2015 — Jun 2017
LE HUYNH NGOC THUY
1
Fullstack Developer
- At Apiumtech, I work as a full-stack engineer
- Methodologies: Agile, TDD and DDD
- Technologies: AngularJS, NodeJS, Python, Django, Mongo, Docker, PHP, Java, Scala, MSSQL, MySQL, Jenkins...
- Website: http://apiumhub.com
Lazada Group
July 2017 — Present
Senior Developer
At Lazada Group, I work as a backend engineer
Logistic team:
- Develop logistic services
- Technologies: Golang, Docker, Kubernete, RabbitMQ, Redis
Internal tool team:
- Develop internal ticketing system. Jira like, allow submitting and processing everyday business issue. Is used by 60+
business units inside Alibaba corp.
- Technologies: Java, Spring-boot, Alicloud (for logging), MySQL, MyBatis, BPMS...
Hands-on experience during working time: prometheus, grafana, graphite, message queue, redis...
EDUCATION
Software Engineer Diploma
Aug 2008 — Oct 2010
FPT Aptech
Bachelor of Information Technology
Feb 2011 — Feb 2015
RMIT University Vietnam
PROJECTS
CaliCargo
- Website development with orders & inventory management system.
- Designed by Webflow tool.
- Using Yii Framework & AngularJS.
- My role: Back-end Developer
- URL: http://calicargo.com/
Kashiwanoha
- A web-based application that shows user their health statistics (using data from wearables)
- Use PHP (Chamilo frameword), Angular JS and Bootstrap
- My contribution: display graph from given data (using Google Chart API), get data from API, build a mobile web
application base on given API and UI design.
Force Manager
LE HUYNH NGOC THUY
2
- Front-end development using AngularJS
- Javascript MVC
- Graph manipulation (Plot.js and Google Chart)
- Jasmine
AXA Manager
- AngularJS, NodeJS, MSSQL Server, Docker
- Javascript MVC, Jasmine, Sinon, Mocha
RareConnect
- PHP (Symfony), MySQL, Docker 
- Google Map API, Google Place API
Falabella
- Samsung Gear S2 application
- HTML5, CSS3, JQuery, Tizen
Cl3ver
- Dashboard management system with workspaces, projects inside workspaces, presentation inside projects,
resource sharing between users...
- NodeJS 4.3.2, Typescipt, AngularJS
- MySQL, Nginx, Docker, Docker Networking, Mocha, Sinon, Jasmine, Electron
- Microservice, API Authorization, File Upload, PDF file manipulation
VOLUNTEER
RMIT Student Ambassador (1 year)
- Introduce about RMIT IT program with highschool students
- Be a tour guide for high school students and their parents who are invited to RMIT 
AIESEC Team Member (1 year)
- Help the marketing department of AIESEC RMIT launch projects
INTERESTS
- Book, Movie, Yoga, Charity
REFERENCES
References available upon request.
LE HUYNH NGOC THUY
3
